title: Your weather update for Monday (23)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Meteorology announced that showers will occur at times in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and Nuwara-Eliya, Kandy, Galle, and Matara districts.
Several spells of showers will occur in the North-western province and mainly fair weather will prevail elsewhere.
Strong winds of about 40 kmph can be expected at times over the western slope of the central hills, Northern, North-Central, and North-Western provinces, and in Hambantota and Trincomalee districts.
